sentences.sContent: The stability of any foam ultimately relies on the hindrance of bubble coalescence.
sentences.sContent_eng: The stability of any foam ultimately relies on the hindrance of bubble coalescence.
sentences.sCn: 任何泡沫的稳定性归根到底都依赖于阻止泡泡们的合并。

sentences.sContent: Eventually, our group began to coalesce with other anti-abortion groups. The coalescence gave us a stronger voice, but we also lost an element of control over the group’s activities.
sentences.sContent_eng: Eventually, our group began to coalesce with other anti-abortion groups. The coalescence gave us a stronger voice, but we also lost an element of control over the group’s activities.
sentences.sCn: 后来，我们的组织开始联合其他反堕胎组织，这一联合使我们的呼声更具威力，但组织活动还缺少些许控制。

sentences.sContent: He writes, "Convergence involved the coalescence of various deities, and or some of their features into the figure of Yahweh" There's a period of convergence and blending of the deities.
sentences.sContent_eng: He writes, "Convergence involved the coalescence of various deities, and or some of their features into the figure of Yahweh" There's a period of convergence and blending of the deities.
sentences.sCn: 他写到“集合包括多个神灵的合并，他们的一些特别最终集合于耶和华“,有过一段众神集合混杂的时期。
